page.title: 13Employment
page.content: The{employment}in this block is very limited,being either on the{land}or in the{egg packing plant}of Kenninghall. Also in Kenninghall there is employment in{service}industries such as the local pubs, restaurant and shops. {Commuting}to the larger towns of Thetford, Diss, Attleborough and Norwich is now an accepted way of {earning}ones "crust". {Unemployment}amongst{school leavers}is high reflecting the current{political ideology.The more able school leavers usually go on to further education whilst the others join the ever increasing{"dole"}queue.
